revised_title: Thermal Isomerization of 1,2-Dimethylcyclopropane: Cis-Trans Isomerization and Structural Isomerization
tldr: The authors investigate the thermal isomerization of 1,2-dimethylcyclopropane, focusing on both cis-trans isomerization and structural isomerization. They find that the cis-trans isomerization occurs as a reversible, homogeneous, unimolecular reaction, while the structural isomerization is slower and yields various olefines. The authors use gas chromatography to analyze the reaction mixtures and determine the rate constants and equilibrium constants for the reactions.
